Events that occurred on 26 March.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1931 - Leonard Nimoy, who would reach cult status with The Ballad of Bilbo Baggins, is born.
1938 - "There's magic in The Hobbit", Houghton Mifflin's advertisement for The Hobbit, is printed in Publishers Weekly.
1954 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 143d.
2011 - 3rd Conference on Middle-earth in Westford, Massachusetts.
2011 - Author Diana Wynne Jones dies.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
Frodo and Sam, rescued out of the fire, rest in Ithilien.
